headline: CorServ Collaborates with Jack Henry to Bring Integrated Credit Card Management to Digital Banking
summary: CorServ, a company enabling banks and fintechs with modern credit card issuing solutions, announced today that their bank clients can now offer credit card account management to cardholders through the Jack Henry™ digital banking platform. CorServ leveraged the Banno Digital Toolkit™, the same set of APIs the Banno Digital Platform™ is built on, to embed its technology into the digital experiences offered by community and regional financial institutions.
